initial_expr: ∀ (input : List Int) (state : LISState input) (h_sorted : PilesSorted state.piles) (h : state.processed < input.length) (p : Nat) (hp : p < state.piles.size), (processElement input state h).piles[p]! ≤ state.piles[p]!

goals.target: ∀ (input : List Int) (state : LISState input) (h_sorted : PilesSorted state.piles) (h : state.processed < input.length) (p : Nat) (hp : p < state.piles.size), (processElement input state h).piles[p]! ≤ state.piles[p]!
